place: Via Giovanni Boccaccio 1, II°, Trieste, Austria
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Grant Richards, I would be glad to hear from you with reference to the letter I wrote you a fortnight ago which I hope reached you. I am surprised you did not write before now to let me know how you regard my latest ‘concessions’. A letter would restore in large measure my peace of mind so I will ask you to write me by return of post. Faithfully yours Jas A Joyce
